byline.original: By ANDY NEWMAN and JOHN ELIGON

abstract: Mr. Bloomberg entered and exited court through an unusual entrance, managing to give the slip to reporters waiting to follow up on his testimony on Monday.
snippet: Mr. Bloomberg entered and exited court through an unusual entrance, managing to give the slip to reporters waiting to follow up on his testimony on Monday.
lead_paragraph: All along the sidewalk at the Manhattan Criminal Courthouse and lining the hallways outside the 11th-floor courtroom, the news media horde stood waiting: cameras rolling, flashes poised to pop, shoutable questions on the tips of tongues.

headline.main: With Furtive Steps, Bloomberg Made His Way to Court
